snippet: In a sign of the seismic changes underway in the tech industry, Microsoft will give away the software for iPads, iPhones and Android tablets.
abstract: Microsoft will give away comprehensive mobile edition of its flagship Office software for iPad, iPhone and Android tablet users; decision to give away the proverbial golden goose is part of plan by new chief executive Satya Nadella's to make cloud and mobile computing the lodestars of company's future.
lead_paragraph: In a sign of the seismic changes underway in the tech industry, Microsoft will give away the software for iPads, iPhones and Android tablets.

headline.main: Microsoft, Changing Tack, Makes Office Suite Free on Mobile
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Changes Tack, Making Its Office Suite Free on Mobile
